Double Untung 10-10, Amnesti Denda dan Diskon Pajak bagi Penunggak 5 Tahun atau Lebih
07 Nov 2019, 03:24 by Advertorial
BANDUNG, (PR).- Telat membayar Pajak Kendaraan Bermotor atau PKB? Jangan khawatir, Anda bisa menjadi pahlawan pembangunan daerah dengan mengikuti program Double Untung 10-10.
Bertepatan momentum Hari Pahlawan 10 November tahun ini, Badan Pendapatan Daerah (Bapenda) Provinsi Jawa Barat (Jabar) menawarkan bebas denda pajak kendaraan (amnesti) untuk semua tunggakan pajak dan diskon pajak kendaraan (menunggak 5 tahun atau lebih) pada pembayaran periode 10 November hingga 10 Desember 2019.
Menurut Kepala Bapenda Jabar Hening Widiatmoko, program Double Untung 10-10 ini bertujuan untuk meningkatkan kesadaran masyarakat agar taat membayar pajak tepat pada waktunya.
"Ini kami tujukan untuk yang menunggak pajak dalam jangka waktu cukup panjang, lima tahun atau lebih. Dendanya dihilangkan, bahkan bayarnya dikurangi cukup empat tahun pokok pajak. Tahun kelima tidak perlu bayar karena kami bebaskan pokoknya," kata Hening di Gedung Sate, Rabu 6 November 2019.
"Program ini kami upayakan membuat penunggak pajak sadar bahwa membayar tepat waktu lebih baik karena tidak perlu dibayang-bayangi ketakutan dan bayar denda," tambahnya.
Meski begitu, Hening mengingatkan bahwa masyarakat tetap harus mengurus Surat Tanda Nomor Kendaraan (STNK) yang berlaku lima tahun. "Dia harus urus STNK baru dengan datang ke kantor induk dan bayar untuk yang ke depan. Jadi yang ke belakang ini (yang) diberi pengampunan," ujar Hening.
"Ini diharapkan menjadi daya tarik bagi yang menunggak pajak cukup lama, yang berpikir tunggakannya sangat besar. Semoga ini bisa digunakan agar surat izin kendaraannya (STNK) bisa dihidupkan kembali," katanya.Â 
Selain itu, Hening berujar program Double Untung 10-10 bertepatan perayaan Hari Pahlawan ini sekaligus kampanye untuk menjadikan masyarakat taat pajak sebagai pahlawan bagi daerahnya.
"Di masa lalu, pahlawan adalah orang yang berjuang untuk kemerdekaan. Tapi kini, pahlawan adalah orang yang berbuat baik untuk negerinya, untuk Tanah Air. Caranya macam-macam, warga biasa yang punya kendaraan bermotor bisa jadi pahlawan jika membayar PKB tepat waktu," ujar Hening.
"Artinya, dia sadar bahwa uang pajak dibayar untuk membangun daerahnya. Bapenda Jabar tentu berharap 10 November nanti dimaknai bahwa pahlawan hari ini adalah pahlawan bagi mereka yang membayar PKB tepat waktu," tegasnya.
Tawaran amnesti denda pajak dan diskon pajak dalam program Double Untung 10-10 ini bisa didapatkan melalui semua pelayanan Bapenda Jabar termasuk pembayaran Samsat J'Bret (Samsat Jawa Barat Ngabret) melalui aplikasi belanja online seperti Tokopedia dan Bukalapak, gerai minimarket Alfamart dan Indomaret, hingga di Bank bjb.
"Satu syarat, kalau STNK sudah mati, tetap datang untuk urus STNK ke depan. Jangan sampai (pajak) sudah dibayar, tapi tidak diurus karena (proses) belum lengkap, sekalian urus STNK," imbau Hening.
Adapun bagi Bapenda Jabar, program Double Untung 10-10 ini juga bertujuan untuk meningkatkan pendapatan daerah melalui PKB. Selain itu, program ini diharapkan semakin mendorong penggunaan Samsat J'Bret --layanan pembayaran pajak yang diluncurkan Januari 2019.
"Setelah Januari (2019), kami hitung PKB yang dibayarkan lewat online melalui Samsat J'Bret, itu ternyata antusiasme masyarakat luar biasa. Tahun 2018 ada e-Samsat lewat bank atau ATM (pendapatan) hanya Rp114 miliar sepanjang tahun," ucap Hening.
"Sejak adanya Samsat J'Bret via aplikasi online dan gerai modern, valuasi luar biasa. Di 2019 ini hingga Oktober sudah mencapai hampir Rp400 miliar. Kami hitung sampai Desember bisa mencapai Rp500 miliar. Jadi memang ada kemudahan untuk membayar pajak, kecuali yang lima tahun atau lebih," imbuhnya.
Jabar sendiri telah meluncurkan mekanisme Elektronik Samsat atau E-Samsat pada 2014. Hening berharap, provinsi dengan jumlah penduduk terbanyak di Indonesia ini menjadi motor bagi provinsi lain dalam hal pembayaran pajak kendaraan.
"Karena kami sudah mulai sejak 2014, ditambah Samsat J'Bret di 2019 ini. Inovasi baru akan menjadi jaminan bahwa pelayanan kami akan meningkat, kami lebih cermat, angka akurat karena terdata sistem," tutur Hening.
"Kita beruntung karena infrastruktur di Jabar bagi pelayanan publik melalui IT sangat bagus. Ke depan, kami akan terus mencari inovasi agar masyarakat merasa semakin mudah membayar pajak," tutupnya.***

Double Fortunately 10-10, Amnesty Fines and Tax Discounts for Arrears of 5 Years or More
Nov 7 2019, 03:24 by Advertorial
BANDUNG, (PR) .- Late to pay Motor Vehicle Tax or PKB? Don't worry, you can become a hero of regional development by joining the Double Untung 10-10 program.
Coinciding with the momentum of Heroes' Day on November 10 this year, the Regional Revenue Agency (Bapenda) of West Java Province (West Java) offers a vehicle tax free (amnesty) for all tax arrears and vehicle tax discounts (in arrears of 5 years or more) on payments of the period 10 November to December 10, 2019.
According to the Head of West Java Bapenda Hening Widiatmoko, the Double Untung 10-10 program aims to increase public awareness to be obedient to pay taxes on time.
"We are aiming for those who are in arrears for a long period of time, five years or more. The penalty is eliminated, even the payment is reduced by just four years of tax principal. The fifth year does not need to be paid because we free the principal," Hening said at Gedung Sate, Wednesday 6 November 2019.
"We are working on this program to make tax arrears aware that paying on time is better because there is no need to be overshadowed by fear and pay fines," he added.
Even so, Hening reminded that people still have to take care of the Vehicle Registration Certificate (STNK) which is valid for five years. "He has to take care of the new STNK by coming to the main office and paying for the future. So the latter is given forgiveness," Hening said.
"This is expected to be an attraction for tax arrears for a long time, who think the arrears are very large. Hopefully this can be used so that the vehicle license (STNK) can be revived," he said.
In addition, Hening said that the Double Untung 10-10 program coincided with the celebration of Heroes' Day as well as a campaign to make tax-obedient people heroes for their region.
"In the past, heroes were people who fought for independence. But now, heroes are people who do good for their country, for the country. The way things are, ordinary citizens who have motorized vehicles can become heroes if they pay PKB on time," said Silence.
"It means, he is aware that tax money is paid to develop the region. West Java Bapenda certainly hopes that on 10 November it will be interpreted that today's heroes are heroes for those who pay PKB on time," he said.
The offer of tax fines and tax discounts in the Double Untung 10-10 program can be obtained through all Bapenda Jabar services including payment of Samsat J'Bret (West Java Samsat Ngabret) through online shopping applications such as Tokopedia and Bukalapak, Alfamart and Indomaret minimarket outlets, to at the Bank bjb.
"One condition, if the vehicle registration is dead, still come to take care of the vehicle registration in the future. Do not let (tax) have been paid, but not taken care of because (the process) has not been completed, as well as taking care of the vehicle registration," added Silence.
As for West Java Bapenda, the Double Untung 10-10 program also aims to increase regional income through PKB. In addition, the program is expected to further encourage the use of Samsat J'Bret - a tax payment service launched in January 2019.
"After January (2019), we calculate PKB paid via online through Samsat J'Bret, it turns out that the enthusiasm of the community is extraordinary. In 2018 there is e-Samsat through banks or ATMs (revenue) of only Rp114 billion throughout the year," said Hening.
"Since the existence of Samsat J'Bret via online applications and modern outlets, the valuation is extraordinary. In 2019 until October it has reached nearly Rp. 400 billion. We calculated that up to December, it could reach Rp. 500 billion. So it is indeed easy to pay taxes, except for five years. or more, "he added.
West Java itself has launched the Electronic Samsat or E-Samsat mechanism in 2014. Hening hopes that the province with the most population in Indonesia will become the motor for other provinces in terms of vehicle tax payments.
"Because we have started since 2014, added Samsat J'Bret in 2019. New innovations will be a guarantee that our services will improve, we are more accurate, accurate figures because the system is recorded," said Silence.
"We are lucky because the infrastructure in West Java for public services through IT is very good. Going forward, we will continue to look for innovations so that people find it easier to pay taxes," he concluded. ***
